Posts.Content: Hello, My mother was diagnosed with stage III breast cancer in nov 2002. She ended up having a double masectomy in Dec. 2002, during her surgery the lab at the hospital lost the lymph nodes and they couldnt be sure it hadnt spread .She has went through the chemo and the radiation,but now the doctors say the cancer has metasticised to stage 4 in her spine. They have given her radiation but they say basically that there is nothing more they can do. I am at a loss as to what to do next. My mom is in constatnt pain and has just about given up. i have started researching alternative therapies but i am not sure if they would help. I am not sure what questions i should be asking nor who to ask..Any help or advice would eternally appreciated.
Posts.Title: my Mom Has Breast Cancer and it Has Spread to Her Spine

Posts.Content: Thank you for all replies and the name of meds to mention to mom's doctor. Finding this site has helped my mom and myself tremendously. We now at least have a direction to go.Thanks so much.
Posts.Title: my Mom Has Breast Cancer and it Has Spread to Her Spine

Posts.Content: Tara, Thank you for your reply. I am sorry to hear about your step mother. I will keep her and you in my prayers. My momma lost her fight with cancer on May 23,2005. She fought hard but the cancer was just to advanced. If you ever need to talk to some one or just want some one to listen,please feel free to send me an email. Take Care, Bonnie
Posts.Title: my Mom Has Breast Cancer and it Has Spread to Her Spine
